page.title: 10The Crown Inn, Otford.
page.content: When we interviewed the licencee of "The Crown Inn"we found out a lot of different things. For instance the oldest part of the inn is 500 years old. It was originally built as a stable. It had been a bakers, but about 150 years ago it was converted into an inn. Most old pubs are supposed to be haunted but this one is not. Most of its staff are part-timers. There has been only one fight there in the landlord's memory. The busiest day is Saturday. Their deliveries arrive on Thursdays and Fridays (That is if they don't run out of anything) They open for four hours in the mornings and for five hours in the evening, A particular attraction to customers is the set of cups won over the years by Otford football team. The pub is open for 365 days a year.
